mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NO PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_TYPE PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_IN_PRICE PRODUCT_IN_PRICE, PRODUCT_OUT_PRICE PRODUCT_OUT_PRICE, PRODUCT_DETAIL PRODUCT_DETAIL FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_TYPE LIKE #{type} AND PRODUCT_NO LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword1}, '%') AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword2}, '%') LIMIT #{form}, #{amount}

SELECT PRODUCT_NO PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_TYPE PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_IN_PRICE PRODUCT_IN_PRICE, PRODUCT_OUT_PRICE PRODUCT_OUT_PRICE, PRODUCT_DETAIL PRODUCT_DETAIL FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT_NAME ASC
SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT_TYPE PRODUCT_TYPE FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT_TYPE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_IN_PRICE, PRODUCT_OUT_PRICE, PRODUCT_DETAIL) VALUES ( #{PRODUCT_NO}, #{PRODUCT_NAME}, #{PRODUCT_TYPE}, #{PRODUCT_IN_PRICE}, #{PRODUCT_OUT_PRICE}, #{PRODUCT_DETAIL})
mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_NAME PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_TYPE PRODUCT_TYPE, P.PRODUCT_IN_PRICE PRODUCT_IN_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_OUT_PRICE PRODUCT_OUT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_DETAIL PRODUCT_DETAIL, F.FILENAME FILENAME FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_FILE F ON P.PRODUCT_NO = F.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = #{PRODUCT_NO}
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_NO = #{PRODUCT_NO}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{PRODUCT_NAME}, PRODUCT_TYPE = #{PRODUCT_TYPE}, PRODUCT_IN_PRICE = #{PRODUCT_IN_PRICE}, PRODUCT_OUT_PRICE = #{PRODUCT_OUT_PRICE}, PRODUCT_DETAIL = #{PRODUCT_DETAIL}, WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{PRODUCT_NO}
